item.title: All 2025 BAFTA Games Awards Nominations and Predictions
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/all-2025-bafta-games-awards-nominations-and-predictions/

The BAFTA team has revealed the full suite of nominations for the 2025 BAFTA Games Awards, one of the most prestigious awards ceremonies in the wide world of gaming. This year’s event marks the 21st iteration of the showcase, and more than 40 games have received nominations.

Check out the full list of 2025 BAFTA Games Awards nominations below to find out if your favourite game of 2024 made the cut.

2025 Nominations

This is the full list of nominations – enjoy!

Animation

  • Astro Bot
  • Black Ops 6
  • LEGO Horizon Adventures – Prediction
  • Hellblade II
  • Thank Goodness You’re Here!
  • Space Marine 2

Artistic Achievement

  • Astro Bot
  • Black Myth: Wukong
  • Harold Halibut
  • Neva – Prediction
  • Hellblade II
  • Still Wakes The Deep

Audio Achievement

  • Animal Well
  • Astro Bot
  • Helldivers 2
  • Hellblade II – Prediction
  • Star Wars Outlaws
  • Still Wakes The Deep

Best Game

  • Astro Bot – Prediction
  • Balatro
  • Black Myth: Wukong
  • Helldivers 2
  • Thank Goodness You’re Here
  • The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom

British Game

  • A Highland Song
  • LEGO Horizon Adventures
  • Paper Trail
  • Hellblade II
  • Still Wakes The Deep – Prediction
  • Thank Goodness You’re Here

Debut Game

  • Animal Well
  • Balatro – Prediction
  • Pacific Drive
  • Tales of Kenzera: Zau
  • Thank Goodness You’re Here!
  • The Plucky Squire

Evolving Game

  • Diablo IV
  • Final Fantasy XIV Online
  • No Man’s Sky – Prediction
  • Sea of Thieves
  • Vampire Survivors
  • World of Warcraft

Family

  • Astro Bot – Prediction
  • Cat Quest III
  • LEGO Horizon Adventures
  • Little Kitty, Big City
  • Super Mario Party Jamboree
  • The Plucky Squire

Game Beyond Entertainment

  • Botany Manor
  • Kind Words 2
  • Hellblade II
  • Tales of Kenzera: Zau – Prediction
  • Tetris Forever
  • Vampire Therapist

Game Design

  • Animal Well
  • Astro Bot – Prediction
  • Balatro
  • Helldivers II
  • Tactical Breach Wizards
  • Echoes of Wisdom

Multiplayer

  • Black Ops 6
  • Helldivers II – Prediction
  • LEGO Horizon Adventures
  • Super Mario Party Jamboree
  • TEKKEN 8
  • Space Marine 2

Music

  • Astro Bot
  • Black Myth: Wukong
  • Final Fantasy VII Rebirth – Prediction
  • Helldivers II
  • Hellblade II
  • Star Wars Outlaws

Narrative

  • Black Myth: Wukong
  • Dragon Age: The Veilguard
  • Final Fantasy VII Rebirth
  • Metaphor: ReFantazio
  • Hellblade II – Prediction
  • Still Wakes The Deep

New Intellectual Property

  • Animal Well
  • Balatro – Prediction
  • Black Myth: Wukong
  • Metaphor: ReFantazio
  • Still Wakes The Deep
  • Thank Goodness You’re Here

Performer in a Leading Role

  • Alec Newman – Still Wakes The Deep
  • Humberly Gonzalez – Star Wars Outlaws
  • Isabella Inchbald – Indika
  • Luke Roberts – Silent Hill 2 – Prediction
  • Melina Juergens – Hellblade II
  • Y’lan Noel – Black Ops 6

Performer in a Supporting Role

  • Abbi Greenland & Helen Goalen – Hellblade II
  • Aldis Amah Hamilton – Hellblade II
  • Jon Blyth – Thank Goodness You’re Here!
  • Karen Dunbar – Still Wakes The Deep
  • Matt Berry – Thank Goodness You’re Here! – Prediction
  • Michael Abubakar – Still Wakes The Deep

Technical Achievement

  • Astro Bot
  • Black Myth: Wukong – Prediction
  • Black Ops 6
  • Hellblade II
  • Tiny Glade
  • Space Marine 2

Which games do you want to see win the most BAFTA Awards? Let us know in the comments!

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out our breakdown of all the Assassin’s Creed Shadows pre-order bonuses

Xbox Game Pass Titles for March 2025 Revealed 

Xbox Game Pass titles for March 2025 include 33 Immortals, One Lonely Outpost, Galaticare and more games. Here is the schedule.

Hellblade II and Astro Bot Lead The BAFTA Games 2025 Nominations

BAFTA has revealed the full list of nominations for the BAFTA Games Awards 2025, due to take place in April. Get the details here.

EXCLUSIVE – Ubisoft’s Far Cry Extraction-Based Multiplayer Shooter Has Been Rebooted

The Far Cry extraction-based shooter under codename Maverick has been rebooted, Insider Gaming has learned.

Acclaim Returns As Publisher Under New Owners After 20 Years

After more than 20 years, Acclaim is returning as a publisher to help support indie games and “resurrect and revitalize its beloved portfolio”

item.title: All Assassin’s Creed Shadows Pre-Order Bonuses & Editions
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/all-assassins-creed-shadows-pre-order-bonuses-editions/

Assassin’s Creed Shadows has gone with a different approach for pre-order bonuses and editions. It could be a beneficial move to help the latest sequel succeed, and we’ve got the latest on every AC Shadows edition and how to claim pre-order bonuses.

Ubisoft isn’t shy about having multiple editions for one of its AAA releases. This is evident with Assassin’s Creed Shadows having several different editions to choose. In a positive move, Ubisoft has ditched the title’s Season Pass and is offering planned post-launch content for free—to an extent.

This is likely part of the reason why Assassin’s Creed Shadows pre-orders are strong. So let’s catch you up on every AC Shadows edition and all pre-order bonuses.

Assassin’s Creed Shadows Pre-Order Bonuses

Every edition of Assassin’s Creed Shadows has two pre-order bonuses: The Claws of Awaji of DLC and the Thrown to the Dogs Quest.

To be clear, if you pre-order Assassin’s Creed Shadows, you get both pieces of content for free. Thrown to the Dogs is a typical AC quest found in the game, whereas Claws of Awaji is a DLC with 10+ hours of new content. The first gameplay trailer is very promising, and if you’re looking to maximize your Assassin’s Creed Shadows experience, it might be worth pre-ordering early.

If you don’t, The Claws of Awaji DLC will be released at a later on as a standalone purchase. There is no Season Pass for Shadows, making it the first AC release in a long time to skip the popular business move.

Every Assassin’s Creed Shadows Editions & Prices

Assassin’s Creed Shadows has three main editions: Standard Edition, Digital Deluxe Edition, and the Collector’s Edition.

There’s nothing out of the ordinary when it comes to Assassin’s Creed Shadows’ editions. Your commitment to the game, interest, and how much you’re interested in extra content all come into your edition decision.

Here’s every edition and the full extent of what you get with it:

Standard Edition Contents

  • Base copy of Assassin’s Creed Shadows
  • Thrown to the Dogs Free Quest (Pre-order bonus)
  • Claws of Awaji DLC (Pre-order bonus)

Deluxe Edition Contents

  • Base copy of Assassin’s Creed Shadows
  • Thrown to the Dogs Free Quest (Pre-order bonus)
  • Claws of Awaji DLC (Pre-order bonus)
  • Assassin’s Creed Shadows Sekiryu Dual Pack:
    • Sekiryu Gear Set for both Naoe and Yasuke
    • Eye of the Dragon Katana
    • Claw of the Dragon Long Katana
    • Sekiryu Beast Mount
    • Dragon Tooth Trinket
  • The Assassin’s Creed Shadows Hideout Pack:
    • Sekiryu Wagasa
    • Sekiryu Tapestry
    • Sekiryu Mask
    • Sekiryu Mizubachi
  • Mastery Points

Collector’s Edition Contents

  • Base copy of Assassin’s Creed Shadows
  • Thrown to the Dogs Free Quest (Pre-order bonus)
  • Claws of Awaji DLC (Pre-order bonus)
  • Assassin’s Creed Shadows Sekiryu Dual Pack:
    • Sekiryu Gear Set for both Naoe and Yasuke
    • Eye of the Dragon Katana
    • Claw of the Dragon Long Katana
    • Sekiryu Beast Mount
    • Dragon Tooth Trinket
  • The Assassin’s Creed Shadows Hideout Pack:
    • Sekiryu Wagasa
    • Sekiryu Tapestry
    • Sekiryu Mask
    • Sekiryu Mizubachi
  • Mastery Points
  • Steelbook Case
  • A lifesize Naoe’s Katana Tsuba
  • A physical AC Shadows World Map
  • 40cm Naoe & Yasuke Statue
  • 76-page Collector’s Artbook
  • 70x30cm Creed Wall Scroll
  • Two Sumi-E Lithographs (19×13.5cm)

Ubisoft has tried to make Assassin’s Creed Shadows the most consumer-friendly in some time. Will you be picking up any of its editions, or will you wait for the Assassin’s Creed Shadows review embargo before making a decision? Share your thoughts and see if others feel the same.

Plus, check out potential AC Shadows Early Access and the latest on the title coming to Xbox Game Pass.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.
